title: Product Card
description: Responsive product card with image, title, price, and add to cart button
template: Create a responsive [framework] product card with image, title, price, and an 'Add to cart' button. Use [style]. Props: { id, imageUrl, title, price, onAdd }. Make accessible with aria labels.

title: Testimonial Carousel
description: Accessible testimonial carousel with autoplay and controls
template: A testimonial carousel component that accepts an array of { name, photo, quote }. Autoplay optional, accessible controls. No external carousel libraries.

title: Hero Section
description: Hero banner with headline, subtext, CTA, and responsive image
template: Hero banner with headline, subtext, call-to-action, and responsive image. Use lazy loading for images.

title: Modal Dialog
description: Reusable modal with focus trap and accessibility features
template: Reusable modal component with focus trap, close on ESC, and accessible ARIA roles.

title: Responsive Grid Layout
description: Grid with responsive columns and gap utilities
template: Grid with responsive columns and gap utilities using Tailwind classes.

title: Form with Validation
description: Form component with client-side validation and error messages
template: Form component with client-side validation, error messages, and form submit handler stub.

title: Accessible Button
description: Button component with size variants and accessibility states
template: Button component with size variants, aria-pressed states, and keyboard focus styles.

title: Profile Card
description: Small card showing avatar, name, bio, and action buttons
template: Small card showing avatar, name, short bio, and action buttons.

title: Loading Skeleton
description: Skeleton loading variants using CSS animations
template: Skeleton loading variants (text, avatar, card) using CSS animations.

title: Toast Notification
description: Non-blocking toasts with queueing and auto-dismiss
template: Non-blocking toasts with queueing, auto-dismiss, and undo action option.

title: Icon Grid
description: Grid displaying icons from SVG sprite with labels
template: Grid that displays icons from an inlined SVG sprite with labels.

title: Footer Links
description: Simple footer with link list and copyright
template: Simple footer with link list and copyright.

title: Responsive Navbar
description: Mobile-first navigation with hamburger menu and dropdown
template: Responsive navbar with mobile hamburger menu, dropdown navigation, and logo. Include active state styling and smooth transitions.

title: Breadcrumb Navigation
description: Hierarchical navigation showing current page path
template: Breadcrumb component that accepts an array of { label, href } objects. Show current page without link, previous pages as clickable links.

title: Tab Navigation
description: Accessible tab interface with keyboard navigation
template: Tab navigation component with keyboard arrow key support, ARIA attributes, and content panels. Include active state styling.

title: Pagination Controls
description: Page navigation with ellipsis for large datasets
template: Pagination component with page numbers, previous/next buttons, and ellipsis for large page counts. Include disabled states.

title: Sidebar Navigation
description: Collapsible sidebar with nested menu items
template: Collapsible sidebar with nested menu items, expand/collapse functionality, and responsive behavior. Include icons and active states.

title: Data Table
description: Sortable table with pagination and search
template: Data table with sortable columns, pagination, search functionality, and responsive design. Include loading states and empty states.

title: Card List
description: Responsive grid of cards with hover effects
template: Responsive card list component with hover effects, loading states, and empty state. Cards should be clickable and accessible.

title: Stats Dashboard
description: Dashboard with key metrics and charts
template: Dashboard component displaying key metrics with icons, trend indicators, and mini charts. Include loading states and error handling.

title: Timeline Component
description: Vertical timeline showing events or progress
template: Timeline component with events, dates, and descriptions. Include different states (completed, current, upcoming) and responsive design.

title: Search Input
description: Search input with autocomplete and suggestions
template: Search input with autocomplete dropdown, debounced search, and keyboard navigation. Include clear button and loading indicator.

title: File Upload
description: Drag-and-drop file upload with progress
template: File upload component with drag-and-drop, progress bar, file type validation, and preview. Include error states and file size limits.

title: Multi-Select Dropdown
description: Multi-select with search and tag display
template: Multi-select dropdown with search functionality, selected items as tags, and keyboard navigation. Include select all/clear options.

title: Date Range Picker
description: Calendar component for selecting date ranges
template: Date range picker with calendar interface, keyboard navigation, and validation. Include preset ranges (last week, month, etc.).

title: Rating Input
description: Star rating component with hover effects
template: Star rating component with hover effects, half-star support, and accessibility features. Include read-only and interactive modes.

title: Alert Banner
description: Dismissible alert with different severity levels
template: Alert banner with different types (success, warning, error, info), dismissible functionality, and icons. Include auto-dismiss option.

title: Progress Bar
description: Animated progress bar with percentage display
template: Progress bar component with percentage display, smooth animations, and different sizes. Include indeterminate state for loading.

title: Loading Spinner
description: Customizable loading spinner with size variants
template: Loading spinner with different sizes, colors, and animation speeds. Include overlay option for full-screen loading.

title: Hide Show Animation
description: A component that toggles visibility of a box with scale and opacity animations
template: Create a hide/show animation component using React, Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion. The component toggles a box's visibility with scale and opacity transitions using Framer Motion. Include a button to trigger the animation. Ensure accessibility with aria labels.

title: Tooltip Component
description: Contextual tooltip with positioning options
template: Tooltip component with smart positioning, delay options, and rich content support. Include keyboard accessibility and mobile touch support.

title: Notification Center
description: Notification panel with different types and actions
template: Notification center with different types (success, error, info), action buttons, and grouping. Include sound and vibration options.

title: Page Header
description: Page header with title, actions, and breadcrumbs
template: Page header component with title, subtitle, action buttons, and optional breadcrumbs. Include responsive behavior and sticky option.

title: Container Layout
description: Responsive container with max-width and padding
template: Container component with responsive max-widths, consistent padding, and optional background. Include different size variants.

title: Split Panel
description: Resizable split panel layout
template: Split panel component with resizable divider, minimum/maximum sizes, and keyboard controls. Include vertical and horizontal orientations.

title: Sticky Header
description: Header that sticks to top when scrolling
template: Sticky header that becomes fixed when scrolling past a threshold. Include smooth transitions and backdrop blur effect.

title: Dropdown Menu
description: Context menu with keyboard navigation
template: Dropdown menu with keyboard navigation, submenus, dividers, and icons. Include click-outside-to-close and escape key handling.

title: Accordion
description: Collapsible content sections with smooth animation
template: Accordion component with smooth expand/collapse animations, keyboard navigation, and optional single/multiple open modes.

title: Range Slider
description: Dual-handle range slider with labels
template: Range slider with dual handles, value labels, step increments, and keyboard controls. Include disabled state and custom styling.

title: Toggle Switch
description: Animated toggle switch with labels
template: Toggle switch component with smooth animation, labels, and different sizes. Include disabled state and loading indicator option.

title: Image Gallery
description: Responsive image gallery with lightbox
template: Image gallery with responsive grid, lightbox modal, lazy loading, and keyboard navigation. Include image captions and zoom functionality.

title: Video Player
description: Custom video player with controls
template: Custom video player with play/pause, progress bar, volume control, and fullscreen. Include keyboard shortcuts and mobile touch controls.

title: Audio Player
description: Compact audio player with waveform
template: Audio player component with play/pause, progress bar, volume control, and optional waveform visualization. Include playlist support.

title: Drag & Drop Zone
description: File drop zone with drag states
template: Drag and drop zone with visual feedback, file validation, and progress indicators. Include multiple file support and error handling.

title: Infinite Scroll
description: Infinite scroll with loading indicators
template: Infinite scroll component with intersection observer, loading indicators, and error retry. Include performance optimizations for large lists.

title: Virtual List
description: Virtualized list for large datasets
template: Virtual list component for rendering large datasets efficiently. Include dynamic item heights, scroll restoration, and keyboard navigation.

title: Sortable List
description: Drag-and-drop sortable list items
template: Sortable list with drag and drop reordering, visual feedback, and keyboard controls. Include nested items and disabled states.

title: Chart Component
description: Responsive chart with multiple chart types
template: Chart component supporting line, bar, pie, and area charts. Include responsive design, animations, and interactive tooltips.

title: Calendar Widget
description: Interactive calendar with event display
template: Calendar widget with month/week/day views, event display, and date selection. Include keyboard navigation and responsive design.

title: Search Filters
description: Advanced search with multiple filter options
template: Search filters component with multiple filter types (text, select, date range, checkbox). Include clear all and filter count display.

title: Stepper Component
description: Multi-step form with progress indicator
template: Stepper component for multi-step forms with progress indicator, validation, and navigation controls. Include optional step skipping.

title: Floating Action Button
description: FAB with expandable menu options
template: Floating action button with expandable menu, smooth animations, and accessibility features. Include different positions and sizes.

title: Badge Component
description: Status badges with different variants
template: Badge component with different variants (success, warning, error, info), sizes, and optional icons. Include dismissible option.

title: Avatar Component
description: User avatar with fallback and status indicator
template: Avatar component with image fallback, initials, status indicator, and different sizes. Include group avatar option.

title: Chip Component
description: Removable chips for tags and filters
template: Chip component with removable option, different variants, and icons. Include keyboard navigation and accessibility features.

title: Skeleton Loader
description: Skeleton placeholders for loading states
template: Skeleton loader with different shapes (text, avatar, card, list) and shimmer animation. Include customizable colors and sizes.

title: Fade Transition
description: Smooth fade in/out transitions
template: Fade transition component with customizable duration, delay, and easing. Include enter/exit animations and conditional rendering.

title: Slide Transition
description: Slide in/out animations for content
template: Slide transition component with directional options (up, down, left, right) and customizable duration. Include spring animations.

title: Bounce Animation
description: Bounce effect for attention-grabbing elements
template: Bounce animation component with customizable intensity, duration, and trigger options. Include hover and click triggers.

title: Pulse Animation
description: Pulsing effect for loading and status indicators
template: Pulse animation component with customizable speed, scale, and color. Include different pulse patterns and conditional activation.

title: REST API Endpoint
description: Create REST API endpoints with proper validation and error handling
template: Create a REST API endpoint for [purpose] using [method] method. Include request validation, error handling, proper HTTP status codes, and response formatting. Use [framework] framework.

title: GraphQL Resolver
description: GraphQL resolvers for queries and mutations
template: Create a GraphQL resolver for [entity] with [operations] operations. Include input validation, error handling, proper response formatting, and type definitions.

title: Webhook Handler
description: Handle incoming webhooks from external services
template: Create a webhook handler for [service] that processes [event_type] events. Include signature verification, retry logic, error handling, and proper response codes.

title: File Upload API
description: Handle file uploads with validation and storage
template: Create a file upload API endpoint that accepts [file_types] files. Include file validation, size limits, virus scanning, and secure storage. Return file URLs and metadata.

title: Search API
description: Implement search functionality with filters and pagination
template: Create a search API for [content_type] with [search_features] features. Include pagination, sorting, filtering, and full-text search capabilities.

title: Bulk Operations API
description: Handle batch processing operations
template: Create a bulk operations API for [operation_type] that processes multiple items efficiently. Include progress tracking, error handling, and rollback capabilities.

title: Database Schema
description: Design database tables with relationships and constraints
template: Design a database schema for [entity] with tables for [tables]. Include proper relationships, foreign keys, indexes, constraints, and data types. Use [database_type] database.

title: Database Migration
description: Create database schema changes with rollback support
template: Create a database migration to [action] [table] table. Include rollback functionality, data validation, and proper error handling. Use [migration_tool].

title: Database Query
description: Optimized database queries with joins and filters
template: Write an optimized [query_type] query for [purpose] with proper joins, filters, pagination, and performance considerations. Include query explanation and optimization notes.

title: Database Indexing
description: Create database indexes for performance optimization
template: Create database indexes for [table] table to optimize [query_patterns] queries. Include composite indexes, partial indexes, and performance analysis.

title: Data Validation
description: Input sanitization and data validation
template: Implement data validation for [data_type] with [validation_rules] rules. Include sanitization, type checking, format validation, and custom business rules.

title: Database Backup
description: Automated database backup and recovery
template: Create automated database backup system for [database_type] with [backup_frequency] frequency. Include compression, encryption, retention policies, and recovery procedures.

title: JWT Authentication
description: Token-based authentication with JWT
template: Implement JWT authentication with [provider] login, token generation, refresh tokens, middleware for protected routes, and proper token validation.
business_intents: Handle user logout and session expiry

title: OAuth Integration
description: OAuth integration with external providers
template: Integrate OAuth with [provider] for user authentication. Include callback handling, user profile sync, session management, and error handling.

title: Role-Based Access Control
description: Permission system with roles and access control
template: Implement RBAC system with [roles] roles and [permissions] permissions. Include middleware for route protection, permission checking, and role management.

title: Password Reset
description: Secure password reset functionality
template: Create password reset functionality with email verification, secure token generation, expiration handling, and rate limiting for security.

title: Two-Factor Authentication
description: Enhanced security with 2FA
template: Implement two-factor authentication using [method] method. Include QR code generation, backup codes, verification handling, and user preferences.

title: Session Management
description: User session handling and management
template: Create session management system with [session_type] sessions. Include session creation, validation, expiration, cleanup, and security measures.

title: Redis Cache
description: In-memory caching with Redis
template: Implement Redis caching for [cache_purpose] with [cache_strategy] strategy. Include cache invalidation, TTL management, and performance monitoring.

title: Database Caching
description: Query result caching for performance
template: Implement database query caching for [query_type] queries with [cache_duration] duration. Include cache invalidation, hit/miss tracking, and performance metrics.

title: CDN Setup
description: Content delivery network configuration
template: Configure CDN for [content_type] with [cdn_provider]. Include cache headers, compression, edge locations, and performance optimization.

title: Cache Invalidation
description: Smart cache invalidation strategies
template: Implement cache invalidation strategy for [cache_type] with [invalidation_method] method. Include dependency tracking, batch invalidation, and consistency checks.

title: File Upload Handler
description: Process and validate file uploads
template: Create file upload handler for [file_types] files with [validation_rules] validation. Include progress tracking, error handling, and secure processing.

title: Image Processing
description: Resize, optimize, and process images
template: Implement image processing for [image_operations] operations. Include resizing, compression, format conversion, watermarking, and optimization.

title: File Storage
description: Cloud storage integration for files
template: Integrate [storage_provider] for file storage with [storage_features] features. Include upload, download, deletion, and access control.

title: File Validation
description: Security checks and file validation
template: Implement file validation with [security_checks] checks. Include virus scanning, file type verification, content analysis, and security measures.

title: Payment Webhook
description: Handle payment processing webhooks
template: Create payment webhook handler for [payment_provider] with [event_types] event types. Include signature verification, idempotency, and transaction processing.

title: Email Webhook
description: Process email service webhooks
template: Create email webhook handler for [email_service] with [webhook_events] events. Include event processing, status tracking, and error handling.

title: Analytics Webhook
description: Handle analytics and tracking webhooks
template: Create analytics webhook handler for [analytics_provider] with [event_types] event types. Include data processing, aggregation, and reporting.

title: Notification Webhook
description: Process notification service webhooks
template: Create notification webhook handler for [notification_service] with [notification_types] types. Include delivery tracking, retry logic, and user preferences.
